code: import React,{useState}from"react";import axios from"axios";import{useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import{BASE_API_URL,APP_NAME}from"./globals";import"./Login.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Login=()=>{const[email,setEmail]=useState("");const[password,setPassword]=useState("");const navigate=useNavigate();const handleLogin=async e=>{e.preventDefault();try{const response=await axios.post(BASE_API_URL+"/login",{email_mem:email,password_mem:password});alert("Login Successful");navigate("/search",{state:{user:response.data.user}});}catch(error){var _error$response;alert(((_error$response=error.response)===null||_error$response===void 0?void 0:_error$response.data)||"Login Failed");}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"login-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleLogin,className:"login-form",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"login-title",children:"\u0E40\u0E02\u0E49\u0E32\u0E2A\u0E39\u0E48\u0E23\u0E30\u0E1A\u0E1A"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"form-group",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Email:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"email",value:email,onChange:e=>setEmail(e.target.value),placeholder:"\u0E43\u0E2A\u0E48 email \u0E40\u0E08\u0E49\u0E32\u0E40\u0E14\u0E49\u0E2D",className:"input-field"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"form-group",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Password:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"password",value:password,onChange:e=>setPassword(e.target.value),placeholder:"\u0E2B\u0E21\u0E48\u0E2D\u0E07\u0E19\u0E35\u0E49\u0E43\u0E2B\u0E49\u0E43\u0E2A\u0E48\u0E23\u0E2B\u0E31\u0E2A",className:"input-field"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",className:"login-button",children:"\u0E40\u0E02\u0E49\u0E32\u0E2A\u0E39\u0E48\u0E23\u0E30\u0E1A\u0E1A"})]})});};export default Login;
